entity.name: [EC Test] Trump ends press briefing early after question on COVID-19 testing

text:
@ABCNews4 Trump Feb 26th 2020
In front of a packed White House briefing room, Trump told the country there were only 15 cases of coronavirus in the US,and “within a couple days [it is] going to be down to close to zero

Today          1,526,137 cases    
               90,931   deaths
